alert.note: Alert for Cass; Douglas; Lancaster; Sarpy; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 12:18AM CDT until April 19 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CDT FOR SARPY...NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER...SOUTH CENTRAL DOUGLAS... SOUTHEASTERN SAUNDERS AND NORTHWESTERN CASS COUNTIES... At 1218 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Ashland, or 12 miles southeast of Wahoo, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gretna, Millard, Springfield, Wehrspann Lake, Zorinsky Lake, Prairie Queen Recreation Area, Chalco, Walnut Creek Recreation Area, Papillion, Ralston, La Vista, Aksarben, Bellevue, Offutt AFB and South Omaha. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
